name: One Night at Markiplier's
description:
Markiplier falls asleep and finds himself trapped within the world of dreams, and it turns out Slendyman (NOT the trademarked Slenderman, I don't want to get sued) is behind it all! Use skills, summon friends, and fight your way through the dream world with either an axe, a spear, or a sword. Dozens of hidden secrets abound and multiple paths to one ending. Help Mark find his way home or he'll never make videos ever again!

The game features multiple Markiplier sound clips as well as a couple short videos. If you have any issues, feel free to email me at tetsuraryuuken@gmail.com.

This is a non-profit fan-made game; if you paid money for this game you got scammed!
